source:
%%sql
-- DBXDH.DHT_INDUSTRY_SECTOR definition


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.DHT_INDUSTRY_SECTOR  (	

	INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY	INT NOT NULL
,	INDUSTRY_SECTOR_VERSION	INT NOT NULL
,	levelNum	STRING
,	parentCode	STRING
,	code	STRING
,	longDescription	STRING
,	mediumDescription	STRING
,	shortDescription	STRING
,	comments	STRING
,	recordStatus	STRING
,	rowCreateTs	STRING
,	rowUpdateTs	STRING
,	USAGE_RULE	STRING
,	ALT_DESC_FULL_1	STRING
,	ALT_DESC_FULL_2	STRING
,	CURRENT_IND	STRING
,	EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP
,	REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP
,	REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP
,	SOURCE_SYSTEM STRING
,	REC_CHECKSUM STRING
,	REC_STATUS STRING	
,	IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP
,	IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP
,   ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND STRING	
) 
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
LOCATION 'abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/dimensions/DHT_INDUSTRY_SECTOR'

#sample table
# Create table in the metastore
from delta.tables import *

DeltaTable.createIfNotExists(spark) \
  .tableName("etlhubConfirmed.test") \
  .addColumn("id", "INT") \
  .addColumn("firstName", "STRING") \
  .addColumn("middleName", "STRING") \
  .addColumn("lastName", "STRING", comment = "surname") \
  .addColumn("gender", "STRING") \
  .addColumn("birthDate", "TIMESTAMP") \
  .addColumn("ssn", "STRING") \
  .addColumn("salary", "INT") \
  .location('abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/dimensions/TEST') \
  .property("mergeSchema", "true") \
  .partitionedBy("gender") \
  .execute()

#sample table
# Create table in the metastore
from delta.tables import *

DeltaTable.createIfNotExists(spark) \
  .tableName("etlhubConfirmed.test_timestamp") \
  .addColumn("EMPLOYEE_DISCON_DT", "TIMESTAMP") \
  .addColumn("EMPLOYEE_EFF_DT", "TIMESTAMP") \
  .location('abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/dimensions/TEST_timestamp') \
  .property("mergeSchema", "true") \
  .partitionedBy("EMPLOYEE_DISCON_DT") \
  .execute()

%%sql
SELECT DISTINCT EMPLOYEE_DISCON_DT
,EMPLOYEE_EFF_DT from fullJoin A 
--
limit 20
